article_title: Uber Suspends Pool Service in U.S. and Canada Amid Covid-19 Outbreak
article_description: As health officials call for social distancing amid the global coronavirus pandemic as a means of mitigating its spread  Uber has announced that it s suspended all Pool services in the United States and Canada as of Tuesday  Read more
article_content: As health officials call for social distancing amid the global coronavirus pandemic as a means of mitigating its spread  Uber has announced that its suspended all Pool services in the United States and Canada as of Tuesday The company said the decision was    1939 chars
